sentence.Network_en: I will never forget all you've done for me, but it's time to cut the umbilical cord.
sentence.Network_cn: 我永世难忘你为我所做的一切，但现在到了我自立的时候了。

sentence.Network_en: The referendum will bring Puerto Rico one step closer to cutting the island's umbilical cord to the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次全民公决将会促使波多黎各进一步摆脱对美国的依靠。

sentence.Network_en: The gut returns to the abdomen from the base of the umbilical cord.
sentence.Network_cn: 肠管从脐带底部回到腹腔.
